title: Marinated fennel and courgette salad with basil
description: Take a breather between courses with a palate cleansing salad of marinated fennel and courgette ribbons topped with beautiful courgette flowers.

method.Step 1: Slice the fennel bulb as finely as you can (set the fronds aside), and spread out in a wide, non-metal dish.

method.Step 2: Very finely slice courgettes (set any flowers aside and leave them whole or slice in half carefully if theyâ€™re big), then put them in the dish with the fennel.

method.Step 3: Squeeze over the juice of both lemons and drizzle over 50ml extra-virgin olive oil. Season with sea salt flakes, then gently toss everything together and leave to marinate for 30-60 minutes.

method.Step 4: To serve, transfer the veg to a serving platter (leaving any excess marinade behind), add the courgette flowers, a handful of basil leaves and the fennel fronds (or a few dill sprigs), then drizzle with a little more olive oil. Season with salt and pepper, then serve.
